meanings.definition: Involving or requiring more than one person to operate or control.
meanings.sent1: The multimanned spaceship needed a team of astronauts to control it.
meanings.sent2: The multimanned submarine allowed the crew to work together efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The multimanned roller coaster made for a fun group experience.
meanings.sent4: The multimanned project was a collaborative effort that led to success.
meanings.sent5: The multimanned vehicle required coordination among the operators.

meanings.definition: Designed to accommodate or be operated by multiple individuals.
meanings.sent1: The multimanned aircraft had enough seats for all the passengers.
meanings.sent2: The multimanned tent was spacious and comfortable for the campers.
meanings.sent3: The multimanned video game was perfect for playing with friends.
meanings.sent4: The multimanned carpool system ensured everyone could travel together.
meanings.sent5: The multimanned elevator could transport a large group at once.
